definition: interesting and appealing (of old locations, objects etc)
lit. fine sculpting (idiom); fig. to work with extreme care and precision
simple and unadorned (of art, architecture etc)
white marble/a type of white marble used for building and sculpting
to pass an exam (or the imperial exam)/to qualify
